name: Word Finder (Piranha305)
description:
Controls:
   Click or Tap on tiles to create words
   Clicking on selected tiles removes letter
   Click on + to submit word
   Click on - to reset word

You have 60 seconds to come up with as many words as possible.

You can download the Construct 3 project file (for free) here https://www.patreon.com/piranha305 

And read the development log here  https://armandoalonso.github.io/wordfinder/
